name: fvsn

stmt.origin: mp2an(wceq(cfv(csn(cop(c0, c1)), c0), c1), wcel(c0, universe), wcel(c1, universe))

body.origin:
|- wceq(cfv(csn(cop(c0, c1)), c0), c1)
-| wcel(c0, universe)
-| wcel(c1, universe)
-| wi(wa(wcel(c0, universe), wcel(c1, universe)), wceq(cfv(csn(cop(c0, c1)), c0), c1))

cumulated.origin:
|- wceq(cfv(csn(cop(c0, c1)), c0), c1)
-| wcel(c0, universe)
-| wcel(c1, universe)
-| wi(wa(wcel(c0, universe), wcel(c1, universe)), wceq(cfv(csn(cop(c0, c1)), c0), c1))

body.origin: |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, universe), wcel(c1, universe)), wceq(cfv(csn(cop(c0, c1)), c0), c1))

comment: The value of a singleton of an ordered pair is the second member. (Contributed by NM, 12-Aug-1994.) (Proof shortened by BJ, 25-Feb-2023.)
